data.name: Crazyness: Weird Village
data.detailed_description:
Crazyness Weird Village is a game made by just one person, it is a first person action game, the game also has a comic peculiarity. In it, you will be in the role of an investigative policeman, who needs to save the president's wife, who has been kidnapped by a villain, who works with biological weapons.
You have been sent on this great mission, but what you don't know is that you will have great challenges, and very strange enemies that live in a village.
Weird village is very big and full of puzzles, this place started to become a village around 1988, and it was founded by civilized and kind people, however, from time to time, the inhabitants started to have strange behavior, some rumors they say they will start practicing cannibalism, and the Weird Village, which was a tourist paradise, has turned into a hostile and mysterious place.
data.about_the_game:
Crazyness Weird Village is a game made by just one person, it is a first person action game, the game also has a comic peculiarity. In it, you will be in the role of an investigative policeman, who needs to save the president's wife, who has been kidnapped by a villain, who works with biological weapons.
You have been sent on this great mission, but what you don't know is that you will have great challenges, and very strange enemies that live in a village.
Weird village is very big and full of puzzles, this place started to become a village around 1988, and it was founded by civilized and kind people, however, from time to time, the inhabitants started to have strange behavior, some rumors they say they will start practicing cannibalism, and the Weird Village, which was a tourist paradise, has turned into a hostile and mysterious place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 ou 10
  • Processor: Processador Intel® Core™ i3‑6006U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Integrated with 2GB GDDR5 128bit
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: Processador Intel® Core™ i5-4460
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon XFX RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

Do not make copies of it and do not redistribute it!
